title: 2015’s Fairphone 2 gets Android 10, rounding out 7 years of software support
content:
Ethically minded smartphone maker Fairphone is now pushing out Android 10 to 2015’s Fairphone 2 and, in turn, offering the longest support period for any Android smartphone to date.

more…

The post 2015’s Fairphone 2 gets Android 10, rounding out 7 years of software support appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Fairphone is now pushing out Android 10 to 2015's Fairphone 2, offering the longest support period for any Android smartphone to date.
